newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - July 8.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - July 8.

text.p: -- Motorola Inc is scheduled to report second quarter results. Analysts expect earnings to grow slightly from the first quarter's $0.53 per share and the year-earlier $0.54 per share. The stock closed at 80-9/16 Monday.

-- Wall Data Inc said it expects earnings of $0.17-$0.20 per share in the second quarter, before charges. Wall Street expects the company to earn $0.34, according to a recent survey by Zacks Investment Research. The stock last traded at 27-12/16.
-- Boston Scientific Corp said net sales for the second quarter increased 25 percent, to $474 million from $379 million a year earlier. The stock closed at 63-1/4.
-- Chrysler Japan Sales Ltd, the Japanese unit of Chrysler Corp, said it is recalling 40,754 sport-utility vehicles to repair five faults. Chrysler closed in New York at 33-13/16.
-- Syntellect Inc said it expects a loss of $0.19-$0.22 per share for the second quarter, versus a loss of $0.03 in the same period last year. The stock last traded at 2-1/2.
